feed.title: Little Grand Rapids - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
